talk.author: did:plc:mkoobrqqtgfxxxu5le7d5ig7
talk.utter: Canada is a constitutional monarchy. Contrary to public rurumors, Canadians don't pay money" to the Royal Family. The only tax $$ we spent on the monarchy are for the Vice Regal offices and Royal Visits, much like we would spend on visits of any other international dignitaries.
